Description:
Contemporary Class
Designed by streamlined interiors and its sleek contemporary impression, this home is a conveniently positioned base to easily access the lifestyle allure Clyde North has to offer. Proudly presented with effortless style is this brand new home loaded with top of the range luxury inclusions built by Henley in one of the most desired estates in Clyde North, ‘Berwick Waters’. High-end, fashionable and functional, this world of luxury is yours for the taking. Master suite includes spacious walk-in robe and ensuite with extended shower, double vanity plus private toilet. Three further spacious and fitted bedrooms (1 x BIR, 2 x WIR’s). Cook up a storm courtesy of a stainless steel Smeg cooker with a 5-burner gas cooktop framed in soft-close cabinetry. Enjoy, entertain, and live high in style but low on maintenance, this sun-drenched residence will excite the senses. Slide the doors open in summer and dine alfresco on the northerly-facing covered deck while children play on the grassed area. A separate laundry room leading directly to the clothesline outside adds a functional touch for busy families. Additional appointments include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, two car remote garage just to name a few. Walk to Hillcrest College and zip to nearby parklands, Eden Rise Village, St Catherine’s Primary School and much more!
Insights: 57 Skylark Boulevard, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 274 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Description:
Break the rental cycle
This good as-new family home has been immaculately finished and has tremendous street appeal. Located in the heart of Ramleigh Springs Estate, literally just a stone throw away from parkland.
Boasting these following important features:
- Master bedroom with elegant full ensuite & walk in robe
- Hostess kitchen offering stone island bench, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher
- Ducted heating & split cooling system
- 2nd & 3rd bedrooms with double built in robe & sliding doors
- Quality carpet & floating floors throughout
- Spacious laundry with additional shelves
- Fully landscaped front & backyard including timber decking
- Double car accommodation with internal access and remote control
- And many more
Easy access to Berwick Cranbourne Rd. Also close to Shopping on Clyde including Coles, McDonald and specialty shops. Minutes to Selandra Rise Primary School, St Peters College, Kids on Clyde and St Thomas Primary School. Ramleigh Springs Estate is fast growing with proposed school, shops, community centre and wet land coming soon. Don't leave it too long as this one will not last.
Photo ID required for all inspections

This brand new home comes with full landscaping, fencing and full turnkey inclusions.
Only 5% deposit, balance on completion!

Description:
Endless opportunity for all...!
CLYDE NORTH: Be drawn to this exceptional opportunity for investment as soon as you walk through the front doors. Built in 2014 and situated in the much sort after Selandra Rise Estate, you will not be disappointed.
Comprising of a generous 4 bedrooms plus study area, 2 bathrooms and 2 car garage, this home is perfect for any family. The master bedroom has walk in robes, with built in robes in the remaining 3 bedrooms. With neutral colours running throughout the house, a sense of warmth is achieved. Adding to the appeal of this home is its open plan living and dining area. The kitchen comes equipped with a laminated bench top, built in pantry and 900mm oven and cooktop, suited for every style of cook. Outdoors you will find an Alfresco area perfect for entertaining family and friends.
Situated in the thriving Selandra Rise Estate in Clyde North, you will be able to enjoy the many benefits of investing in an area which is very well established. Walking trails for the outdoor enthusiast and playgrounds for the little ones to explore, add to the attractiveness of the estate. Furthermore, Selandra Rise also provides access to a variety of local amenities including schools and recreational facilities. With so much to offer, this is a great first home or investment prospect to add to your portfolio.
Potential rental return: $410-$420 p/w
Major amenities within proximity:
* Selandra Rise shopping centre is approximately four minutes' drive away from the house
* Pasadena shopping centre is about 5 minutes' walk away from the house
* Selandra Rise heritage park is within seconds away from the house
* Selandra Rise Community centre & Child Care centres are minutes away from the house
* Berwick and Cranbourne railway stations are about 15minutes' drive away either way
* St Thomas the apostle primary school is approximately a minute drive away from the house
* St. Peters secondary collage is approximately two minutes' drive away from the house
* Wilandra Rise primary school is approximately three minutes' away from the house
* Casey Fields is approximately 15-minute walk away from the house
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Brand New in Meridian
Comprises 4 bedrooms including a spacious master suite with double vanity, double sized shower and 2 separate living areas. Its contemporary design complimented with ‘High Ceilings’ & ‘Gas Ducted Heating’ is completed with a functional indoor/outdoor resort style alfresco, spacious laundry, walk in pantry, 6 star energy efficiency, generous robes & storage space.
Your new home luxury inclusions:
- Designer kitchen with Caesarstone grand island benchtop
- Luxury 900mm European style stainless steel appliances
- Convenient walk-in pantry
- Quality carpet and quality timber look-flooring throughout
- Luxury basins and deluxe tapware
- Driveway, path and fencing
- Convenient remote control garage door
- Resort style timber stacker sliding doors
- Contemporary landscaped
- Great land size
- Recycle water on tap
- Fast NBN internet speed though-out estate

Description:
Simply Stunning
Positioned in the fast-growing Boulevard Estate, this is the perfect home for families, investors or first home buyer! Sitting on 350m2 approx, a low maintenance & stylish home!
Sleeping accommodation comprises of 4 bedrooms, Master equipped with Walk in robe and ensuite including double vanity and oversized shower, two bedrooms with walk in robe and remaining bedroom with mirrored built in robe, accompanied with sophisticated main bathroom with a large shower.
Additionally, a tasteful open plan living space, with modern hostess Kitchen detailed with stunning pendant lights, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and walk in pantry.
Sliding doors open to freshly stained decked area with built in sitting arrangement with lush greenery, perfect for the keen entertainer!
Creature Comforts include; ducted heating, evaporative cooling, NBN box connection, children's cubby house, 4 x security cameras and double lock up garage.
All nearby are local Schools, Shopping Centres, Sports clubs and much more!
You do not want to miss out on this gem!

Description:
Golden Opportunity
Located in Selandra Rise neighbourhood with a distinct village feel, this near new Simonds Home features 3 bedrooms, master with lavish ensuite and sizeable walk in robe. Remaining 2 bedrooms are generously proportioned and complemented by built in robes and the stylish family bathroom.
As you walk in you will be pleasantly surprised by the colour tones, quality fitting, fixtures and the floor plan. The heart of this home is the incredibly impressive and tastefully designed kitchen with stones bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and excellent amount of cupboard and bench space with built in pantry.
Beyond the kitchen, you will find the family living / dining area which has all the space required for easy entertaining, overlooking the alfresco area and low maintenance backyard ideal for entertaining family and friends.
This fabulous family home offers so many extras. A double car remote garage, ducted heating and downlights are just some of the many more features…
With boundless energy for work and play, the streets and open landscapes are abuzz with sports and leisure precincts to inspire a healthy lifestyle.
You will not be disappointed if you are looking for that golden opportunity.The location is just perfect with parklands, shopping facilities and bus services close by and with easy access to schools such as St. Peter's Secondary College & Wilandra Primary School.

Description:
Under Offer
Positioned in a highly desirable location, this five-bedroom, double-storey luxury family home oozes elegance and comfort combined with exceptional functionality, space and soothing neutral tones.
Showcasing a captivating sense of light, space and 9ft high ceilings in the most tranquil of settings, this immaculately presented, as good as new family home, offers two floors of deluxe family living. A beautifully landscaped front garden and an impressive facade sets the scene for a light-filled entry leading to an expansive, open plan family and dining zone with a seamless connection out on to a sizable Alfresco area with a built-in pizza oven, beer on tap, café blinds, spa and all fully landscaped complete with a veggie garden, ideal for outdoor entertaining and for children to play.
The fully equipped kitchen with a large island stone bench, walk-in butler's pantry, (oven details), an abundance of cupboard space and light-filled family and dining area is truly the heart of this bespoke easy-living home with a picture-perfect outlook to the leafy green garden and outdoor area. In addition, downstairs also includes a study, home theatre room complete with surround sound and step up terrace seating, along with a well-appointed laundry and powder room.
Upstairs hosts a palatial master bedroom with a double vanity ensuite with a deep bath and walk-in robe, three additional generous double sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes, a private study/fifth bedroom, a large family bathroom with separate powder-room-style amenities and a spacious leisure/teenage retreat.
Topped off with a remote controlled double garage with internal and external access, additional space for a workshop as well as off-street parking/double driveway, zoned refrigerated air conditioning, ducted heating, quality floor coverings and window furnishings, 4.5kw of solar panels, security system, plenty of additional storage, low maintenance landscaped gardens and a highly sought-after position which has you within minutes of local schools, shopping centres and transport this amazing home is one that won't disappoint!

Description:
Ultimate lifestyle living in Delaray!
Delivering exclusive resort-style living in beautifully landscaped surrounds, Delaray' is a new family community enhanced by gorgeous wetlands, parks and gardens along with the enviable residents' facility, Club Delaray. Imagine lazy days by the pools, catching up with friends for brunch at the neighbourhood café, smashing out a spin class in the gym or playing a civilised game of tennis with your family - it's all here for your enjoyment in the ultimate lifestyle locale.
Positioned within a quiet pocket of this new and exciting neighbourhood, this 448sqm (approx.) allotment is the perfect site to create your dream family home. Level and ready to go, it is just moments to parks, playgrounds and the area's fabulous sporting precinct.
Families of all ages will relish the range of nearby sporting facilities on offer, including Casey Fields & Casey Recreation & Aquatic Centre - this good-sized plot is also within easy reach of shops & established schools, and is merely minutes to the Princes Highway and Cranbourne railway station for a direct workday commute.
Adhering to Villawood Properties' commitment to sustainability & community connectedness, Delaray also features a community garden, while a dedicated Men's Shed will be a fabulous way to meet like-minded residents. *Note Club Delaray is expected to be completed in 2018
Insights: 270 Heather Grove, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Classy home in Clydevale with all the upgrades
Offering a lifestyle to envy in the heart of the Clydevale Estate sits this CHARMING family residence built by Henley homes. With plenty of upgrades, meticulous presentation and functional layout - you would be insane to build something new! Nestled amongst other newly established homes and only 12 months old, this contemporary property features 4 spacious bedrooms plus a beautiful alfresco for all your entertaining needs.
Features of this beautiful home include:
- Stunning Master suite with WIR and en-suite featuring twin basin vanity, oversized shower with large rain style showerhead and separate toilet.
- A further three generously sized bedrooms all with BIR's.
- Luxurious open plan living area plus a separate lounge perfect for those fun family movie nights.
- Beautiful well-appointed kitchen showcasing a stylish oversized island bench with 20mm Caeserstone, breakfast bar, Techika appliances including a five burner gas cooktop and TWO built in ovens, glass splash back, dishwasher PLUS a neat walk in pantry.
- Stunning outdoor alfresco area overlooking the backyard – perfect for entertaining at any time of year.
- Double lock up garage with internal access to the home.
- EXTRAS: Ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, raised ceilings (2550mm) , plumbed fridge area, powder room for guests, 20mm Caeserstone to all bathrooms and powder room, spa bath to central bathroom, built in shelves to both showers, extended laundry bench, double glazed windows with flyscreen's throughout and much, much more!
All this is only second's walk of an amazing established children's park with BBQ area & basketball court plus you'll also find walking and bike tracks provide plenty of opportunity to explore. Perfectly located in Clyde North there is easy access to schools such as Clyde Primary School and just a short drive to Selandra Rise Shopping Centre with 24/7 Gym. The perfect choice for those looking for a stylish & low maintenance lifestyle!
Insights: 19 Carlyle Crescent, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 274 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Description:
Big Block, Ready To Build Your Dream Home!
Located in the highly desirable Berwick Waters Estate this titled 576m2 block is ready for you to build your dream home.
Shopping Galore!
Positioned in a very convenient area with just a short drive to Eden Rise Shopping Centre, Westfield Fountain Gate Shopping Centre and Berwick Village Shops.
Childrens education is important!
Local schools such as Berwick Chase Primary School, St Catherine's Primary School, Hillsmead Primary School, Rivercrest and Hillcrest Christian Colleges are just a few minutes away.
Do your kids love to play?
College Green's Park is underway and will consist of 1.2ha designed for bike and scooter riders, zipline, trampoline, play tower and swings. This park is due to be completed mid 2018
With Casey Hospital close by and easy access to Monash Freeway the location is ideal.
Additional information:
- Flat block of 576m2
- 18m frontage allows for side access. 32m deep.
- Crossover, footpath and back fence completed
- Cardinia reserve at rear offer views and no neighbours behind you
- Development of a school site which is currently being assessed within the College Green
- 5 AFL sized football fields with cricket pitches, 6 tennis courts, 3 soccer grounds, 4 netball courts, BBQ and picnic areas with walking and cycling paths throughout.
Hurry. This remarkable large block of land won't last long.
If you want more information of the surrounding suburb, please go to http://www.frasersproperty.com.au/vic/berwick-waters/life-at
Get in quick and secure your future here in the Berwick Water estate!
Call today for your Section 32 and start planning your future purchase!

Description:
North Facing Titled Block
Located in Clyde North Delaray Estate featuring stunning wetlands, board walks, parklands, playgrounds, public art and large waterfront homesites. This land should be on wish list to either build to move in or to invest. Featuring:
-Block size approx. 400m2 (12.50m X 32.00m)
-Popular North facing rectangular size block
-Off street parking facilities
-Creek Views
With access to Club Delaray you can enjoy the unique lifestyle by getting facilities like gymnasium, tennis, pool and stunning function room.
This well positioned parcel of land offers fantastic creek views and an amazing range of amenities close by.
Don't delay, call Yogi Patel - 0451 719 161 to discuss further.
